NYC Mesh
Blog Meetings

Tuesday, April 15th, 2014

by Peter, April 11, 2014

New Node Request

Our next meeting will be on Tuesday, April 15th. xCubicle, the Lower East Side’s own hackerspace, has kindly agreed to host a meeting for a second time. If you plan to come, please RSVP on this Uniiverse page. If you share the event on Facebook or Twitter, the $5 RSVP fee will be waived. (For those worried, you can target the appropriate friends on Facebook before it gets shared.)

If you want to come and see what we’re up to or you’re just curious about meshnets in general, stop by! We’re a friendly bunch, I promise.

xCubicle
25 Essex St
New York, NY 10002
Tuesday, April 15th, 2014 at 7pm

Site built with Jekyll, Bootstrap and Mapbox.
